verses.kjv: God is our refuge and strength, a very present help in trouble.
verses.ct: God is our shelter and our strength, always ready to help when trouble comes.

verses.kjv: Therefore will not we fear, though the earth be removed, and though the mountains be carried into the midst of the sea;
verses.ct: So we will not be afraid, even if the earth gives way and the mountains collapse into the depths of the sea,

verses.kjv: Though the waters thereof roar and be troubled, though the mountains shake with the swelling thereof. Selah.
verses.ct: even if its waters churn and rage, even if the mountains tremble as the waves surge. Selah.

verses.kjv: There is a river, the streams whereof shall make glad the city of God, the holy place of the tabernacles of the most High.
verses.ct: A river flows whose streams bring joy to the city of God, the sacred dwelling place of the Most High.

verses.kjv: God is in the midst of her; she shall not be moved: God shall help her, and that right early.
verses.ct: God is right there within her; she will never fall. God will come to her rescue at the break of dawn.

verses.kjv: The heathen raged, the kingdoms were moved: he uttered his voice, the earth melted.
verses.ct: Nations were in an uproar, kingdoms crumbled. He raised his voice, and the earth dissolved.

verses.kjv: The LORD of hosts is with us; the God of Jacob is our refuge. Selah.
verses.ct: The LORD of hosts stands with us; the God of Jacob is our shelter. Selah.

verses.kjv: Come, behold the works of the LORD, what desolations he hath made in the earth.
verses.ct: Come and see what the LORD has done â€” the stunning destruction he has brought upon the earth.

verses.kjv: He maketh wars to cease unto the end of the earth; he breaketh the bow, and cutteth the spear in sunder; he burneth the chariot in the fire.
verses.ct: He puts an end to wars across the entire earth; he snaps the bow, shatters the spear, and sets the war chariots ablaze.

verses.kjv: Be still, and know that I am God: I will be exalted among the heathen, I will be exalted in the earth.
verses.ct: "Be still, and recognize that I am God. I will be honored among the nations; I will be honored throughout the earth."

verses.kjv: The LORD of hosts is with us; the God of Jacob is our refuge. Selah.
verses.ct: The LORD of hosts stands with us; the God of Jacob is our shelter. Selah.
